doc.title: 2004 East Coast Bigfoot Conference
doc.plot: Does Bigfoot Exist? What are the leading theories in current Bigfoot research? Does Bigfoot exist on the East Coast? What equipment is being used to track the elusive animal? These and many other questions will be answered in this three-disc DVD set that will explore detailed evidence that has been collected by investigators. Listen to strange reports of encounters with unknown creatures. Examine photographs of unidentified tracks and pinpoint sighting locations on maps. The subject of ghosts and hauntings will also be discussed as bonus topics. Bonus Features include special interviews with speakers, a photo gallery, the DVD trailer and video footage not presented at the 2004 conference.

The subject of ghosts and hauntings will also be discussed as bonus topics. Bonus Features include special interviews with speakers, a photo gallery, the DVD trailer and video footage not presented at the 2004 conference.
